title: Productivity
description: Get productive with the best productivity apps.

resources.title: Bardeen
resources.description: Bardeen saves you time by automating repetitive tasks with a shortcut. It combines a powerful workflow builder, AI-based recommendations, and contextual automations.

resources.title: Miro
resources.description: The online collaborative whiteboard platform to bring teams together, anytime, anywhere.

resources.title: Notion
resources.description: One tool for your whole team. Write, plan, and get organized.

resources.title: Obsidian
resources.description: Obsidian is a powerful knowledge base on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files.

resources.title: Pomofocus
resources.description: An online Pomodoro Timer to boost your productivity.

resources.title: Slack
resources.description: Transform the way you work with one place for everyone and everything you need to get stuff done.

resources.title: Taskade
resources.description: Chat, organize, and get work done with real-time to-do lists, mind maps, org charts, and more.

resources.title: Zapier
resources.description: Easy automation for busy people. Zapier moves info between your web apps automatically, so you can focus on your most important work.
